item.description:
Chunky's is dedicating the month of May to some of the greatest musicals of all time!  sing-a-long with your favorite characters on the big screen! Last but not least, "Mamma Mia"  which I still have not seen. 

"Mamma Mia" -  The story of a bride-to-be trying to find her real father told using hit songs by the popular '70s group ABBA.  rated PG-13.

Join me after work for dinner and movie.

ADMISSION IS FREE!

The movie starts at 7pm and doors open at 6pm.

group.name: Meeting & Greeting in So. NH & the Merrimack Valley :)

item.name: FREE Musical Classic at Chunkys: Mamma Mia
